channel.title: CVE Feed for hwk-fr -- WP 404 Auto Redirect to Similar Post
channel.description: The latest CVEs for hwk-fr -- WP 404 Auto Redirect to Similar Post

item.title: CVE-2024-0509|2024-02-05T21:21:47.651Z -- hwk-fr -- WP 404 Auto Redirect to Similar Post
item.description: The WP 404 Auto Redirect to Similar Post plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘request’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-32559|2024-04-18T10:07:21.712Z -- hwk-fr -- WP 404 Auto Redirect to Similar Post
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in hwk-fr WP 404 Auto Redirect to Similar Post allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP 404 Auto Redirect to Similar Post: from n/a through 1.0.4.
